revised_title: Iodo-Derivatives of Orcins: Synthesis and Properties
tldr: The author, John Stenhouse, explores the synthesis and properties of iodo-derivatives of orcin, specifically monoiodorcin and iodoresorcin. He describes the process of creating these compounds using iodine and lead oxide, and discusses their solubility, reactivity, and decomposition when heated. The findings contribute to the understanding of orcin derivatives and their potential applications.
